attributes.action: request the Queen bestow the title of Knight upon Mr. Richard Hammond.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Hammond stands as a symbol of perseverance and strength for all of England.  In light of Mr. Hammond's recent astonishing recovery, determination to continue on and Mr. Hammond's continued service to the people of England, I believe that Mr. Hammond has earned the title of Knight.
